message: This proposal divides the amount equally, considering the risk of inflation. I'm willing to take a larger share to start.
I appreciate your willingness to share, but I think I can get a better deal. This proposal is more fair in my opinion, considering the risk of inflation. Let's see what you think.
I've decided to split the amount equally, considering both our needs and the risk of inflation. This should ensure fairness for both of us.
